TextView.android:text: Don’t back down! Get a satisfaction from being tested and defeating the test!! Sometimes you have to resist working on your strengths in favour of your weaknesses. The decathlon requires a wide range of skills…
ROUND 1: LAST MAN STANDING Use your sherlockian skills to find or answer given questions
ROUND 2: ALPHABETICS Find different technical words from different jumbled grids
ROUND 3: BUILD IT Make a tower using given material
ROUND 4: BURN IT Keep a balloon on a candle flame for 10 seconds without bursting it
ROUND 5: MEMORIZE Memorize and write at least 10 words from the set shown to you in 15 seconds written in a particular colour
ROUND 6: SHOTS IN A ROW A team has to bounce and put three balls in a 9x9 grid by bouncing them on a table
ROUND 7: EAT IT IF YOU CAN Give 4 correct answers otherwise face the hell!!!
ROUND 8: SUDDEN DEATH Move an iron rod through a roller coaster circuit or you will be shocked by the consequences.
ROUND 9: RAPID FIRE Take on the bouncing questions which come your way.
ROUND 10: THE MAZE RUNNER Trust your partner and reach your goal.
